publ: by Shenzhen LiviRobo Electronic Co., Ltd
name: Livirobo
0:
”Alexa, turn on robot”
”Alexa, turn off robot”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Livirobo can provide the ability of voice control robot vacuum cleaner by Alexa, It gives you more intelligent and convenient life. Below are the usage steps:
1, Download Livirobo App. Download link: https://log.livirobo.com/appDownload
2, Open the APP and log in the account.
3, Add your robot device to the account.
4, You can rename your device in the App, so you can easily control it by Alexa Dot.
5, Search “livirobo“in the Alexa App, find this skill.
6, Click “ENABLE”, then enter account authorization page, which need verify code.
7, Launch Livirobo App, click the user information on the upper left corner -> choose “More Services” in the Pop-ups-> ”Alexa” -> ”Link to Alexa” -> acquire one verification code. Fill the verification code in the account authorization at step 6.
8, After authorization, wait for Alexa Dot to find the device .
9, After Alexa Dot find the device in the Livirobo, you can begin to control these devices by voice.
